casebody.data:
Celestine STACKER, Personal Representative of the Estate of Mae Hendrix, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
LAUTREC, LTD, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 155120
COA: 328191 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan Association for Justice to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on November 7, 2018, is accepted for filing.
